title: Peppernotter - Spiced Christmas Biscuits
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '150g caster sugar', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '65g almonds, chopped (optional)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '375g plain flour', '125g icing sugar', '2 teaspoons water']
